title: The Education of Henry Adams - "these were ideals"

content.prompt: Which of the following most accurately conveys the meaning of "these were ideals" in the second paragraph?

choices.label: Henry’s sensory perceptions were vague and inaccurate.
Henry’s sensory perceptions were defined by books.
The objects and colors of summer existed for Henry, not as reality, but as symbols.
The intense qualities of Henry’s surroundings represented unqualified standards.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
